comment: Advice to all actors , musicians and entertainers : Please stick to your crafts that we all love you for and drop the political rhetoric .
amr:

      :ARG1 (y / you
            :mod (a2 / all)
            :ARG0-of (a3 / act-01)
            :mod (m / musician)
            :ARG0-of (e / entertain-01))
      :ARG2 (a4 / and
            :op1 (s / stick-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG2 (c / craft
                        :ARG2-of (l / love-01

                              :mod (a5 / all))
                        :poss y))
            :op2 (d / drop-05
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (r / rhetoric
                        :mod (p / politics)))))

comment: or use the freedom of speech that people died for . I don't have to agree . But thank god they can say it . Freely .
